name: Merge Shot
description:
In the square frame, the player is 0 and proceeds in the center.

Bounce to the wall through a sling shot (like a slingshot) to match the number of the target block.

If you hit it after matching it, it will be fine and the block will disappear.

Blocks are translucent and materialize when the player becomes the same number.

I bumped into the block and said, "What are you doing?"

When the difficulty level of the map goes up, there's a big square wall in the center.

It also has the same properties as a block, but it has a different point of bounce the player like a normal wall.

Normal walls, moving walls, and square walls increase by 1 each time they bounce. 

Keep this in mind. 

Whenever it's far from the block, you can get iron, copper, silver, and gold ingredients and sell coins.

You can get it.

Learn skills with coins and get closer with sling shots!
